App Recovery Center

If you're seeing a white screen or the app isn't loading properly, try these recovery options below.

What this does:

  • Clears temporary data that might be causing issues
  • Resets the app to a fresh state
  • Keeps your login and preferences safe
  • Works for most white screen and loading problems

If problems persist, try opening the app in an incognito/private window.

For ongoing issues, please report them to support.
